activities.description: The AI will present a list of machine learning terms.  You will write the definition or appropriate synonym in Chinese for each.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: Machine learning algorithms are used to build intelligent systems.
vocabulary.example_sentence_cn: 机器学习算法被用来构建智能系统。
vocabulary.pinyin_example: Jīqì xuéxí suànfǎ bèi yònglái gòujiàn zhìnéng xìtǒng.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: The algorithm determines the best path to the solution.
vocabulary.example_sentence_cn: 该算法决定了通往解决方案的最佳路径。
vocabulary.pinyin_example: Gāi sùfǎ juédìngle tōngwǎng jiějuéfāng'àn de zuìjiā lùjìng.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: A large data set is required for training the model.
vocabulary.example_sentence_cn: 训练模型需要一个大型数据集。
vocabulary.pinyin_example: Xùnliàn móxing xūyào yīgè dàxíng shùjījí.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: The model predicts the likelihood of an event.
vocabulary.example_sentence_cn: 该模型预测事件发生的可能性。
vocabulary.pinyin_example: Gāi móxíng yùcè shìjiàn fāshēng de kěnéngxìng.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: The model learns from the input features.
vocabulary.example_sentence_cn: 模型从输入特征中学习。
vocabulary.pinyin_example: Móxíng cóng shūrù tézhēng zhōng xuéxí.

activities.description: The AI will give a series of technical statements about machine learning.  Reformulate each statement into a question using appropriate grammar structures for questioning.  The AI will check your accuracy.

statements.statement_en: Machine learning algorithms can be applied to many problems.
statements.question_en: Can machine learning algorithms be applied to many problems?
statements.question_cn: 机器学习算法可以应用于许多问题吗？
statements.pinyin: Jīqì xuéxí suànfǎ kěyǐ yìngyòng yú xǔduō wèntí ma?

statements.statement_en: The accuracy of a model depends on the data quality.
statements.question_en: Does the accuracy of a model depend on the data quality?
statements.question_cn: 模型的准确性取决于数据质量吗？
statements.pinyin: Móxíng de zhǔnquèxìng qíutuán yú shùjù zhìliàng ma?

statements.statement_en: Deep learning is a type of machine learning.
statements.question_en: Is deep learning a type of machine learning?
statements.question_cn: 深度学习是一种机器学习吗？
statements.pinyin: Shēn dù xuéxí shì yī zhǒng jīqì xuéxí ma?
